title: Kieran Hayler showers Jett and Bunny with toys as Katie Price reels from coke and sex slurs

Kieran Hayler has been spoiling his kids Bunny and Jett with toys as their mum reels from her coke and sex slurs.

The dad, 32, gave his fans a glimpse into his shopping trip with the youngsters as they wandered around a toy shop on Thursday.

The former stripper, who shares Jett, six, and Bunny, five, with Katie Price , was clearly thrilled to be spending the afternoon with his two children.

Kieran shared the clip with his 110K followers as he captured the moment Jett and Bunny explored aisles of colourful toys.

The children appeared to be excited by the assortment of toys as Jett could be seen rummaging though boxes in one aisle while Bunny eyed up the unicorn toys in another.

(Image: Instagram)

Kieran sweetly questioned Bunny: "What are you doing Buns?"

To which the cute little girl dressed in school uniform replied: "Just having a look!"

Kieran's toy shopping trip with the little ones comes after Katie's latest scandal with her former toyboy lover Charles Drury .

The 41-year-old former glamour model was left raging after Charles, 22, spoke out about his exploits with the TV star.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The builder and model rated her a measly 1/10 for her "lazy" sexploits and claimed she jumped into bed with him the first time they met , and they snorted coke together before he passed out.

A source recently told Mirror Online that the mum of five is "livid" with Charles rating her sexual prowess so low.

Our source said: "She's obviously going to be annoyed at the drug claims he's made about her, but rating her a one out of ten in bed is going to land him in really hot water with her."

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

(Image: Youtube)

Katie's fling with Charles came after she ditched on/off lover Kris Boyson, in favour of new toyboy Charles and they went off to Turkey on a wild partying holiday.

Just days later, Katie rekindled with Kris and stopped talking to Charles, when he refused to sign a NDA (non-disclosure agreement) regarding their recent tryst.

Katie is now back on with Kris following her latest scandal.

(Image: Instagram)

At the beginning of September, Kieran started a war with the children's mum, Katie, as he demanded full custody of Bunny and Jett.

Katie found love with her ex-husband Kieran when they were first put in touch on online chat service Blackberry Messenger in November 2012.

It was a whirlwind romance as the couple were married in the Bahamas in January 2013, just shortly after he got down on one knee on Christmas Day 2012.

They renewed their vows in October 2016 but their romance wasn't meant to last as Katie dumped Kieran for good in 2018.
description: Katie's estranged husband Kieran shared an Instagram story as he traipsed around a toy shop with his little ones
